name: Jerry Trogdon
text: I really loved their dishes. I always get excellent service there. The place is clean and the employees are always super nice. Will come visit again.

name: Tourmaline Kings
text: Pretty solid pizza for the prices.   Similar to Little Ceasers but a little bit more expensive and not quite as convenient.   Don't forget to get the flavored crust upgrade that's always free.   This specific location is usually really quick for pickup,  15-20 minutes max.   We will definitely go back for more.
